help-file.title: "TITAN"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: one titan Aggressive: No Cumulative: N/A Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Generic
When cast, "Titan" creates a illusionary 60 foot tall replica of the caster that will carry out his or her orders without question until ether the victim dies or the illusion has taken enough damage!
